internetstapler.title: Internet Stapler
internetstapler.summary: It is a stapler for our internet age.

isthatcompanyreal.title: Is That Company Real?
isthatcompanyreal.summary: A web service that determines whether or not a given company is “real.”

docroute.title: Docroute
docroute.summary: A dynamic CMS for mostly-static content. This entire site is powered by Docroute.

sort-of-face.title: The Sort of Face
sort-of-face.summary: Inspired by the wildly popular (and eventually debunked) Twitter account @horse_ebooks, The Sort of Face is my attempt at creating a Twitter bot that posts funny gibberish.

myautodump.title: MyAutoDump
myautodump.summary: A wrapper script for mysqldump. MyAutoDump discovers all the databases on a given MySQL server, dumps each one in a gzipped file, and sends status messages to the syslog.

twanslationparty.title: twanslationparty
twanslationparty.summary: Working in conjunction with twitstash, twanslationparty corrupts the English in tweets and reposts each one to another Twitter account.

twitstash.title: twitstash
twitstash.summary: twitstash is a cron script that downloads a Twitter user’s timeline and stores new tweets in a MySQL table. It can be used for archival purposes, data mining, or as a foundation for twanslationparty bots.
